title: Level 7 Mastries in Season 7
body: I have 2 level tokens on Vayne and I was wondering if those carry into season 7.  Do those disappear and I have to get 3 more?  Could someone help me?

replies.body: There hasn't been any announcements about mastery tokens go away so they should still be in your inventory once the season ends.

As far as I'm aware, loot should not reset with the season, so you should keep those tokens just fine, mate.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
